name: Ext_R5_Encounter_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Encounter.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: planned | in-progress | on-hold | discharged | completed | cancelled | discontinued | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the encounter (not the state of the patient within the encounter - that is subjectState).
element.comment: `Encounter.status` maps to R4B `Encounter.status`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: planned | in-progress | on-hold | discharged | completed | cancelled | discontinued | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the encounter (not the state of the patient within the encounter - that is subjectState).
element.comment: `Encounter.status` maps to R4B `Encounter.status`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.
